38.eng-name: The Book of Manners and Etiquette

hadiths.text: Mughira b. Shu'ba reported:When I came to Najran, they (the Christians of Najran) asked me: You read" O sister of Harun" (i. e. Hadrat Maryam) in the Qur'an, whereas Moses was born much before Jesus. When I came back to Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) I asked him about that, whereupon he said: The (people of the old age) used to give names (to their persons) after the names of Apostles and pious persons who had gone before them

chapter.ara-name: باب النَّهْىِ عَنِ التَّكَنِّي، بِأَبِي الْقَاسِمِ وَبَيَانِ مَا يُسْتَحَبُّ مِنَ الأَسْمَاءِ .
chapter.eng-name: The Prohibition Of Taking The Kunyah Abul-Qasim, And The Names Which Are Recommended
